Post-task questionnaire responses. Bars represent responses ranging from 1--Strongly disagree (no bar) to 5--Strongly agree (full bar), averaged across $n=3$ translators per language for [No Highlight]{.smallcaps}, [Oracle]{.smallcaps}, [Unsupervised]{.smallcaps}, and [Supervised]{.smallcaps}. Dotted line mark avg. judgments of 3--Neither agree nor disagree.
